query:
SELECT
    latitude AS "latitude!",
    longitude AS "longitude!",
    "timestamp" AS "timestamp!",
    course_over_ground,
    speed,
    navigational_status,
    rate_of_turn,
    true_heading,
    distance_to_shore
FROM
    (
        SELECT
            latitude,
            longitude,
            "timestamp",
            course_over_ground,
            speed_over_ground AS speed,
            navigation_status_id AS navigational_status,
            rate_of_turn,
            true_heading,
            distance_to_shore
        FROM
            ais_positions a
        WHERE
            $1::INT IS NOT NULL
            AND mmsi = $1
        UNION ALL
        SELECT
            latitude,
            longitude,
            "timestamp",
            course AS course_over_ground,
            speed,
            NULL AS navigational_status,
            NULL AS rate_of_turn,
            NULL AS true_heading,
            NULL AS distance_to_shore
        FROM
            vms_positions v
        WHERE
            $2::TEXT IS NOT NULL
            AND call_sign = $2
    ) q
WHERE
    "timestamp" BETWEEN $3 AND $4
ORDER BY
    "timestamp" ASC
